3.13.0.0.message: Added validation to prevent disabling `https_verify` when the global `tls_certificate_verify` configuration option is enabled.

3.12.0.0.message: Fix an issue where the ai-llm-as-judge plugin didn't work with non-OpenAI provider configuration.
Introduced the AI LLM as Judge plugin, enabling you to evaluate an LLM and use the score as a balancer.
